meanings.definition: A type of small marine mollusk with winglike extensions used for swimming.
meanings.sent1: The pteropod gracefully glided through the ocean waters.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the anatomy of the pteropod to understand its unique swimming abilities.
meanings.sent3: The pteropod challenged the fish to a race, using its winglike extensions to speed ahead.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as smooth and effortless as a pteropod swimming through the sea.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the pteropod's elegant wings as it swam past them.

meanings.definition: Any member of the Pteropoda class of mollusks.
meanings.sent1: The aquarium displayed a variety of pteropods from different regions.
meanings.sent2: Researchers identified a new species of pteropod in the deep sea.
meanings.sent3: The pteropod family reunion was a lively gathering of mollusks from all over.
meanings.sent4: In the world of mollusks, the pteropod stood out as a unique and fascinating creature.
meanings.sent5: The pteropod's shell shimmered in the sunlight, catching the eye of curious onlookers.
